channel.title: Version 5.10 :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: 5.10.2 (2023-01-25) Fixes [bug] nav: fix breadcrumb fer huge installat'ns #446 5.10.1 (2023-01-25) Fixes [bug] print: fix image links wit' relative path #444 5.10.0 (2023-01-25) Enhancements [feature] shorrrtcodes: support fer accent color #440 [feature] shorrrtcodes: add color parameter whar' applic'ble #438 [feature] theme: announce translat'ns as alternate links #422 Fixes [bug] nav: fix breadcrumbs fer deeply nested sections #442 [bug] theme: improve whitespac'n 'n tables #441
